body:
![QDQ Media logo](https://github.com/qdqmedia/qdqmedia.github.com/raw/master/qdqmedia.png)

QDQ Media is a group of leading online marketing agencies active in Spain and Portugal.

Our web products are entirely built on open source software, which is why we are pleased to give back to the community some of our internal projects and contributions to existing ones.

and... we're hiring! If you like working with Python, Django, Javascript, Postgres/MySQL please contact us: rrhh@qdqmedia.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: QDQ Media - open source projects
